example.text: Urging LIN directors *trace* to conduct ``a fair auction on a level playing field,'' ...

example.name: lead music
example.text: I, for instance, was perfectly happy at Avery Fisher Hall the other day listening to Helmuth Rilling conduct the Messa per Rossini, a strange piece written by 13 different Italian composers to honor Rossini after his death in 1868.

example.text: We all thought little Max conducted himself very well.
